title: The Progressive era: reform works in America
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Maurice Schonfeld
brief_description: Evaluates the aims and achievements of the group of American reformers known as the progressives. Depicts social and economic conditions that prevailed during the progressive era, 1890-1919. Describes the election of 1912, when all three presidential candidates ran as progressives.
